name: UploadKubeflowPipeline
description: Upload pipeline to the Kubeflow workspace for use with machine learning
author: CSE-DevOps

inputs.name: kubeflowEndpoint
inputs.label: Kubeflow Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input the URL of the Kubeflow workspace you are trying to upload to. Make sure you put in the url for the homepage in the following format: http://yourURL/

inputs.name: bearerToken
inputs.label: Bearer Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: DO NOT INPUT THE RAW TOKEN HERE! If your API connection requires a bearer token, create a secret pipeline variable and input the variable like this: $(secretVar). For help creating secret variables visit https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/pipelines/process/variables?view=azure-devops&tabs=yaml%2Cbatch#secret-variables

inputs.name: pipelineFilePath
inputs.label: Pipeline Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: File path of the pipeline file to be uploaded. Must be a compressed .tar.gz file.

inputs.name: newPipelineName
inputs.label: Pipeline Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name you would like to give your pipeline.

inputs.name: existingPipelineName
inputs.label: Pipeline Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose an existing pipeline to make a new version of.

inputs.name: versionName
inputs.label: Version Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of your new version of the pipeline.
